sys_email_canned_message.body:
Dear ${contact_detail_spoc_disclosing_country},

Please be aware that we have received notification of a cross border engagement involving the following Covered Recipient(s) from your affiliate:

  • ${name_of_cr}

The project owner for this event is as follows: ${project_owner}

Please ensure this/these CR(s) exist in your local system and that consent for disclosure is requested.

Please remember that consent management is the responsibility of your affiliate. In case you have any questions, please refer to our Q&AÂ or contact us by replying to this email.

Sincerely,
Your Global PLS Cross-Border Team
